meanings.definition: A person who designs or creates monograms.
meanings.sent1: The talented monogrammer personalized my towels with beautiful initials.
meanings.sent2: The monogrammer at the store created a unique design for my bag.
meanings.sent3: The monogrammer joked that they could put my initials on everything, even my toothbrush!
meanings.sent4: She was a true monogrammer, weaving intricate designs with letters.
meanings.sent5: The skilled monogrammer turned plain items into personalized treasures.

meanings.definition: To create or design a monogram.
meanings.sent1: I will monogrammer the towels with our family initials.
meanings.sent2: She loves to monogrammer gifts for her friends.
meanings.sent3: He decided to monogrammer his socks with smiley faces for fun.
meanings.sent4: The artist's hands moved swiftly to monogrammer the fabric.
meanings.sent5: Watching her monogrammer the leather made me want to learn the craft too.
